    Assess combined AMS-I.F applicability conditions

    assess_ams_if_applicability.Rd

    Evaluates the key quantitative applicability criteria for AMS-I.F and returns a tidy summary of results.

    assess_ams_if_applicability(
  capacity_kw,
  renewable_fraction,
  captive_use_share,
  capacity_threshold_kw = 15000,
  renewable_minimum_fraction = 0.75,
  captive_minimum_fraction = 0.6
)

    Arguments

    capacity_kw

    Rated renewable capacity in kilowatts.

    renewable_fraction

    Fraction of electricity supplied by renewable sources (0-1).

    captive_use_share

    Fraction of electricity consumed within the captive or mini-grid system (0-1).

    capacity_threshold_kw

    Capacity threshold in kilowatts.

    renewable_minimum_fraction

    Minimum renewable penetration required for eligibility.

    captive_minimum_fraction

    Minimum captive use share required for eligibility.

    Value

    A tibble summarising each applicability condition and whether it passes.

    Examples

    assess_ams_if_applicability(
  capacity_kw = 9000,
  renewable_fraction = 0.9,
  captive_use_share = 0.7
)
#> # A tibble: 3 × 2
#>   condition                            passes
#>   <chr>                                <lgl> 
#> 1 Capacity below small-scale threshold TRUE  
#> 2 Renewable penetration sufficient     TRUE  
#> 3 Captive use share sufficient         TRUE
